name: Knock Out
details:
Attack EqualizerAn innovative effect pedal from the venerable old Electro Harmonix Soundsmith. The knockout makes angular single coil sounds out of thick humbuckers - to explain it roughly. This is done with genuinely selected bass and treble frequencies that are mixed with the original signal. Edge without end - but also when the bass range is emphasised, there is no mulching. Instead, it produces a very contoured, crisp bass area. Uncomplicated, you can improve your sound or simply create a completely different sound variant from your favorite guitar.
Attack Equalizer
Converts humbucker sound into single coil sound
Converts ST sound into T-Style sound
Dimensions (WxDxH): 102 x 121 x 64 mm
https://www.thomann.de/gb/electro_harmonix_knock_out.htm
